title: Electrode assembly, manufacturing method and manufacturing system thereof, battery cell and battery

events.title: Application filed by Contemporary Amperex Technology Co Ltd

classifications.description: Electrodes for accumulators with non-aqueous electrolyte, e.g. for lithium-accumulators; Processes of manufacture thereof

abstract: The embodiment of the application provides an electrode assembly, a manufacturing method and a manufacturing system thereof, a battery cell and a battery. The electrode assembly comprises a positive electrode plate and a negative electrode plate, wherein a positive electrode active material layer of the positive electrode plate and a negative electrode active material layer of the negative electrode plate face each other, and the end part of the negative electrode active material layer exceeds the positive electrode active material layer. The anode active material layer includes an anode main body portion and an anode edge portion, one end of the anode edge portion facing away from the anode main body portion exceeds the cathode active material layer, at least a portion of the anode edge portion overlaps the cathode active material layer, the anode active material layer is configured such that a unit area capacity of the anode edge portion is larger than a unit area capacity of the anode main body portion, and/or the cathode active material layer includes a cathode main body portion and a cathode edge portion, and the cathode edge portion is configured such that a unit area capacity of the cathode edge portion is smaller than a unit area capacity of the cathode main body portion. The electrode assembly with the structure can reduce the risk of lithium precipitation of the pole piece.
claims: 2.根据权利要求1所述的电极组件，其特征在于，所述负极活性物质层包括负极主体部和连接于所述负极主体部的负极边缘部，所述负极边缘部的背离所述负极主体部的一端超出所述正极活性物质层，且在所述叠加方向上，所述负极边缘部至少一部分与所述正极活性物质层重叠，所述负极活性物质层被配置为：所述负极边缘部的单位面积容量大于所述负极主体部的单位面积容量。2. The electrode assembly according to claim 1 is characterized in that the negative electrode active material layer includes a negative electrode main body and a negative electrode edge portion connected to the negative electrode main body, an end of the negative electrode edge portion facing away from the negative electrode main body exceeds the positive electrode active material layer, and in the stacking direction, at least a portion of the negative electrode edge portion overlaps with the positive electrode active material layer, and the negative electrode active material layer is configured as: the unit area capacity of the negative electrode edge portion is greater than the unit area capacity of the negative electrode main body.

3.根据权利要求2所述的电极组件，其特征在于，所述负极边缘部中的活性材料与所述负极边缘部的重量比大于所述负极主体部中的活性材料与所述负极主体部的重量比，以使所述负极边缘部的单位面积容量大于所述负极主体部的单位面积容量。3. The electrode assembly according to claim 2 is characterized in that the weight ratio of the active material in the negative electrode edge portion to the negative electrode edge portion is greater than the weight ratio of the active material in the negative electrode main portion to the negative electrode main portion, so that the unit area capacity of the negative electrode edge portion is greater than the unit area capacity of the negative electrode main portion.

4.根据权利要求2所述的电极组件，其特征在于，所述负极边缘部中的活性材料的克容量大于所述负极主体部中的活性材料的克容量，以使所述负极边缘部的单位面积容量大于所述负极主体部的单位面积容量。4. The electrode assembly according to claim 2 is characterized in that the gram capacity of the active material in the negative electrode edge portion is greater than the gram capacity of the active material in the negative electrode main body portion, so that the unit area capacity of the negative electrode edge portion is greater than the unit area capacity of the negative electrode main body portion.

6.根据权利要求2所述的电极组件，其特征在于，所述负极边缘部中的活性材料的粒径小于所述负极主体部中的活性材料的粒径。6 . The electrode assembly according to claim 2 , wherein a particle size of the active material in the negative electrode edge portion is smaller than a particle size of the active material in the negative electrode main body portion.

8.根据权利要求7所述的电极组件，其特征在于，在两个所述负极边缘部中，靠近所述负极极耳的所述负极边缘部的至少部分的厚度小于所述负极主体部的厚度，远离所述负极极耳的所述负极边缘部的厚度等于所述负极主体部的厚度。8. The electrode assembly according to claim 7 is characterized in that, among the two negative electrode edge portions, the thickness of at least a portion of the negative electrode edge portion close to the negative electrode tab is less than the thickness of the negative electrode main body portion, and the thickness of the negative electrode edge portion away from the negative electrode tab is equal to the thickness of the negative electrode main body portion.

9.根据权利要求7所述的电极组件，其特征在于，所述负极边缘部的与所述正极活性物质层在所述叠加方向上重叠的部分在所述第一方向上的尺寸大于0.5mm。9 . The electrode assembly according to claim 7 , wherein a portion of the negative electrode edge portion overlapping with the positive electrode active material layer in the stacking direction has a size in the first direction greater than 0.5 mm.
10.根据权利要求2所述的电极组件，其特征在于，所述负极边缘部环绕所述负极主体部设置。10 . The electrode assembly according to claim 2 , wherein the negative electrode edge portion is disposed around the negative electrode main body portion.

11.根据权利要求2-10任一项所述的电极组件，其特征在于，所述负极边缘部包括第一部分和第二部分，所述第一部分与所述正极活性物质层在所述叠加方向上重叠，所述第二部分超出所述正极活性物质层。11. The electrode assembly according to any one of claims 2 to 10, characterized in that the negative electrode edge portion comprises a first portion and a second portion, the first portion overlaps with the positive electrode active material layer in the stacking direction, and the second portion exceeds the positive electrode active material layer.

12.根据权利要求1所述的电极组件，其特征在于，12. The electrode assembly according to claim 1, characterized in that
      
      
         所述正极边缘部的活性材料与所述正极边缘部的重量比小于所述正极主体部的活性材料与所述正极主体部的重量比，以使所述正极边缘部的单位面积容量小于所述正极主体部的单位面积容量。The weight ratio of the active material in the positive electrode edge portion to the positive electrode edge portion is smaller than the weight ratio of the active material in the positive electrode main body portion to the positive electrode main body portion, so that the unit area capacity of the positive electrode edge portion is smaller than the unit area capacity of the positive electrode main body portion.

13.根据权利要求1所述的电极组件，其特征在于，所述正极边缘部的活性材料的克容量小于所述正极主体部的活性材料的克容量，以使所述正极边缘部的单位面积容量小于所述正极主体部的单位面积容量。13. The electrode assembly according to claim 1 is characterized in that the gram capacity of the active material in the edge portion of the positive electrode is smaller than the gram capacity of the active material in the main portion of the positive electrode, so that the unit area capacity of the edge portion of the positive electrode is smaller than the unit area capacity of the main portion of the positive electrode.

15.根据权利要求1所述的电极组件，其特征在于，所述正极边缘部的活性材料的粒径大于所述正极主体部的活性材料的粒径。15 . The electrode assembly according to claim 1 , wherein the particle size of the active material in the positive electrode edge portion is larger than the particle size of the active material in the positive electrode main portion.

16.根据权利要求1所述的电极组件，其特征在于，在两个所述正极边缘部中，靠近所述正极极耳的所述正极边缘部的至少部分厚度小于所述正极主体部的厚度，远离所述正极极耳的所述正极边缘部的厚度等于所述正极主体部的厚度。16. The electrode assembly according to claim 1 is characterized in that, among the two positive electrode edge portions, at least a portion of the thickness of the positive electrode edge portion close to the positive electrode tab is less than the thickness of the positive electrode main body portion, and the thickness of the positive electrode edge portion away from the positive electrode tab is equal to the thickness of the positive electrode main body portion.

17.根据权利要求1或16所述的电极组件，其特征在于，所述正极边缘部在所述第一方向上的尺寸大于0.5mm。17 . The electrode assembly according to claim 1 , wherein a dimension of the positive electrode edge portion in the first direction is greater than 0.5 mm.
18.根据权利要求1所述的电极组件，其特征在于，所述正极边缘部环绕所述正极主体部设置。18 . The electrode assembly according to claim 1 , wherein the positive electrode edge portion is disposed around the positive electrode main body portion.
21.一种用电设备，其特征在于，包括权利要求20所述的电池，所述电池用于提供电能。21. An electrical device, characterized in that it comprises the battery according to claim 20, wherein the battery is used to provide electrical energy.
